start:
🌟 Welcome to Quote Bot! 🌟

I can help you discover inspiring quotes and manage your favorites.

Use /help to see all available commands.
help:
📋 Available Commands:

/start - Welcome message and quick intro
/help - Show this help message
/quote - Get a random inspiring quote
/favorites - View your favorite quotes
/language - Change interface language

Enjoy discovering great quotes! ✨
language_select:
🌐 Language Selection

Choose your preferred language for the bot interface:
favorites_empty:
You don't have any favorite quotes yet.
Use /quote to find inspiring quotes and add them to favorites!
favorites_cleared:
⭐ All your favorite quotes have been removed.

Use /quote to find new inspiring quotes!
quote_already_in_favorites: ⭐ This quote is already in your favorites!
no_favorite_quotes: ❌ You don't have any favorite quotes
confirm_clear_all_favorites:
🗑️ Are you sure you want to clear ALL favorite quotes?

This action cannot be undone!
rate_limit_warning: ⚠️ Please don't send messages too frequently.
api_error:
😔 Something went wrong while fetching the quote.
Please try again later.
quote_fetch_error:
😔 Sorry, I couldn't fetch a quote right now.
Please try again later.

formatters.success_already_in_favorites: ⭐ This quote is already in favorites!{author_info}
formatters.error_already_in_favorites: ⚠️ This quote is already in favorites.
formatters.error_not_in_favorites: ⚠️ This quote is not found in favorites.
